Class AlertBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • AlertBox

  • public abstract class AlertBox
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to display various popup boxes

      AlertBox() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean confirm(java.lang.String message)
      displays a popup for the user to confirm a choice
      static void display(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String button)
      displays a popup with a title, message and custom text for a button
      static java.lang.String displayChoice(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String button)
      displays a window for the user to enter in a string

      displays a popup with a custom message and button

      • display

        public static void display(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           java.lang.String button)
        displays a popup with a title, message and custom text for a button
        Parameters:
        title - the title to be displayed on the popup
        message - the message to be displayed on the popup
        button - the message to be displayed on the popup's button

      • displayNoTitle

        public static void displayNoTitle(java.lang.String message,
                                  java.lang.String button)
        displays a popup with a custom message and button
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed on the popup
        button - the message to be displayed on the popup's button

      • displayChoice

        public static java.lang.String displayChoice(java.lang.String message,
                                             java.lang.String button)
        displays a window for the user to enter in a string
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed on the popup
        button - the message to be displayed on the popup's button
        Returns:
        the string that the user entered

      • confirm

        public static boolean confirm(java.lang.String message)
        displays a popup for the user to confirm a choice
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed in the popup
        Returns:
        true or false based on the user's confirmation
